trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around September 24th 2009
Summary: Bright blue-green light moving at high speed East-West Direction
divs: sighting detailswhile driving south on interstate 85 just south of atlanta, my brother-in-law, my son (18 y\o) and myself spotted a very bright blue-green light in the night sky (it was around midnight). although we were not able to make out any kind of shape it was quite obviously not an airplane (no lights other than a single bright illumination), and it was traveling at a very high rate of speed. there were in fact a few airplanes in the sky at the time, and this object was going much faster and was alot brighter than anything else around. i have lived close to the world's busiest airport for much of my life and am familar with most of the aircraft that populate the sky over and around atlanta. this was unlike anything i have ever seen. there must be others that saw the same thing. i would love to compare notes and hear from anyone that may have seen it. i wish i could provide more detail but i can only report what i (or we) saw and i know there could be a rational explanation for what we saw but i have seen many different types of aircraft and i have flown more than most and i can honestly say this was something other than what one would normally see streaking through the sky, even in atlanta at night.
